mapper.select: select staffInfo.ding_staffid as dingStaffId, e.fd_name as staffName, pe.fd_name as deptName from dingsal_staff_info staffInfo, ding_org_element e INNER JOIN ding_org_element as pe on e.fd_parentid = pe.fd_id where staffInfo.ding_staffid = e.fd_dingid and e.fd_org_type = 64 and staffInfo.corp_id = #{corpId} and e.fd_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.update: update dingsal_staff_info set staff_pass = null, modified_date = #{modifiedDate} where corp_id=#{corpId} and ding_staffId=#{sal.id}

update dingsal_staff_info set staff_pass = null, modified_date = #{modifiedDate} where corp_id=#{corpId} and ding_staffid in ( select s.fd_dingid from ding_org_element s INNER JOIN ding_org_element p on s.fd_parentid = p.fd_id where s.fd_orgid = #{corpId} and p.fd_orgid = #{corpId} and p.fd_dingid = #{deptId} )

pass_state = #{passState},
